item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Republicans worry Trump’s campaign strategy against Harris is failing
2. JD Vance urges billionaire Peter Thiel to help bankroll Trump campaign
3. Nvidia shares fall even as revenue more than doubles
4. Fears of rise in UK capital gains tax trigger selling ‘frenzy’
5. Ukraine’s Kursk invasion ‘devastating’ for Putin, says Sweden
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 11:15 PM UTC
